snippet: The Education Department said it would end its investigation into claims of harassment on Yale’s campus since the university had strengthened its policies.
abstract: Federal Education Dept reports that it is closing the investigative stage of a process to resolve a complaint about sexual harassment on the campus of Yale University based on the strength of the school's proposals for policy changes.
lead_paragraph: The Education Department said it would end its investigation into claims of harassment on Yale’s campus since the university had strengthened its policies.

headline.seo: Yale and U.S. Resolve Sexual Harassment Claim
headline.main: Yale and U.S. Resolve Sexual Harassment Claim
headline.print_headline: Yale and U.S. Resolve Sexual Harassment Claim
